script.caption: Shaq standing outside a Burger King, wearing a king's robe and crown, holding a gigantic 50 pound Whopper.

dialogue.text: Here we find Shaq, the King of all Kings, standing before his glorious kingdom - the Burger King.

script.caption: Shaq attempts to take a bite out of the massive burger, but it's clearly too big.

dialogue.text: Man, this is one Whopper of a challenge.
A challenge worthy of a King, Shaq.

script.caption: Shaq, seen with the burger strategically cut into normal-sized pieces.

dialogue.text: See, a King finds a way. Now, who wants a piece of this royal feast?
The new 50 Pound Whopper - a royal treat, for the king in you.

script.caption: Shaq laughing as he hands out the burger pieces to a crowd of enthusiastic fans.

dialogue.text: Everyone wants a piece of King Shaq's Whopper. Get yours at Burger King today.
